entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Blowing snow at times this evening. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 late this evening then becoming light overnight. Low minus 33. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 8:50 PM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clear. High minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 31. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 40 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 8:50 PM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023
